Texts.Chs: 把^orange;F4能量步枪^reset;带给^green;这位星之子^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的船员信标处)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;f4 Energy Rifle^reset; to the novakid by the crew sign at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 我在这个星球上受尽折磨！真让人火大!你能给我造一支^orange;F4能量步枪^reset;来帮助我生存吗？我会给你足够的补偿...
Texts.Eng: I keep getting devoured on this planet! It sucks! Could you build me an ^orange;F4 Energy Rifle^reset; to help me survive? I'd compensate you well enough...

Texts.Chs: 我谈不上是什么科学家...所以，呃，请收下着这个。
Texts.Eng: I'm not much of a scientist... so umm take this.
